vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.13;
son of: Ishmael (H3458);
brother of: Nebaioth (H5032), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305), Kedemah (H6929) and Mahalath (H4258)
§ Kedar = "dark"
n pr m
1) a son of Ishmael
n pr people
2) the descendants of Kedar
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基達 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "黑暗"
民族專有名詞
1)阿拉伯沙漠裡的遊牧民族
2)(1)的祖先,以實瑪利的兒子 (創 25:13; 代上 1:29)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基达 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "黑暗"
民族专有名词
1)阿拉伯沙漠里的游牧民族
2)(1)的祖先,以实玛利的儿子 (创 25:13; 代上 1:29)
